pageContext.claim: “I informed John Bolton last night that his services are no longer needed at the White House. I disagreed strongly with many of his suggestions, as did others in the Administration, and therefore I asked John for his resignation, which was given to me this morning. I thank John very much for his service. I will be naming a new National Security Advisor next week.”
pageContext.analysis: There is some conflicting information around exactly what happened as Bolton left the White House. Trump claimed he told Bolton his “services were no longer needed” the night before Bolton resigned. Bolton differed with that account tweeting, ““I offered to resign last night and President Trump said, ‘Let’s talk about it tomorrow.’” That's not the same as saying that someone's "services are no longer needed."
